SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

tkwatch
Interface Constants

public interface Constants

Various manifest constants for the tkwatch package. Allows parameterization of code. Important items are defined once here and only referenced (perhaps multiple times) elsewhere.

Contest version.

Field Summary

          Preferred height of Swing buttons.

          Preferred width of Swing buttons.

          Maximum length for the watchlist item instrument (stock symbol) length.
static int MAX_NOTATION_LENGTH
          Maximum length of the watchlist notation, the free text entered by the user to explain or otherwise comment on why the instrument is being watched.

          Maximum quantity for a watchlist item.

          Maximum character count in an HTML page,

          Internal padding for grid bag constraints.

          Manifest constant indicating three columns.
static int UNKNOWN_LENGTH
          Manifest constant for unknown URL content length.
static int UPDATE_SUCCESS
          Manifest constant indicating a successful database update of one row.
